org.jruyi.core

Class RuyiCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jruyi.core.RuyiCore

  • public final class RuyiCore
extends java.lang.Object
    A holder for Scheduler and TimeoutAdmin services. It also provides factory methods for builders of NIO services.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  RuyiCore.IRuyiCore
      This interface defines all the methods that a RuyiCore provider has to implement.
